name: Local Law 83 - City Agency Advertising Spend
creator: NYC OpenData
description: Per Local Law 83 of 2021, the Mayor's Office of Ethnic and Community Media is required to report annually on each agency's full advertising spend across all media categories, including ethnic and community (ECM), mainstream, out-of-home, social media, etc. This dataset reflects the raw data that MOECM received from City Agencies on their annual advertising spend. For more information, please visit the MOECM website.
